review_data.title: A very nice experience
review_data.content: We were deeply impressed by the very fresh mixed salad and the nice dressing accompanying it. We took the Oreqiette which came with tomato paste well diluted with sour cream and herbs (mint?). The service is very nice and despite the lunch hour the place...More

review_data.title: Real nice when you are at Jelmoli
review_data.content: We dropped in the late p.m. Place was not crowded. Impeccable service as usual. Had just a glass of Prosecco and a whole-grain Cornuto. The wine for 9.50 Frs is not at the cheap end but the place is comfortable and real nice.

review_data.title: Best pasta in town
review_data.content: They make fresh pasta on the spot. It is outstanding. So you eat one of the best authentic Italian meals for a relatively affordable price. Highly recommended especially in the late afternoon. At lunch and dinner time the place is quite crowded. For good reasons.

review_data.title: Servizio pessimo!!!
review_data.content: Nessuna attenzione per il cliente. Il personale ama chiacchierare tra di sé con la schiena rivolta ai clienti. Lunghe attese...More

review_data.title: Watching your food being prepared ...
review_data.content: Freshly prepared Pasta and Pizza is the main offer here. We enjoyed two different Pasta, both were delicious ...

review_data.title: Food meets fashion
review_data.content: Perhaps the best spot in Jelmoli for a much needed shopping break. Located on the underground floor, it is a part of a new Jelmoli food hall by Schweitzer Project with a concept work by Interstore Design. Slick and sophisticated space, contemporary food hall design...More

review_data.title: One of the cheapest coffees in Zurich
review_data.content: Coffee, snacks and meals are offered within Jelmoli's premises by Jelmoli itself at a at a high standard but relatively high price. La Bottega located also within Jelmoli's food section offers good service, coffee and meals at prices which are lower than those met at...More
